attributes.action: Keep New Mills Post Office in the centre of the town.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Co op stores have decided to close their town centre store which holds the towns post office.At the moment the Co op have not stated what is to happen to the post office as it has another store on the edge of town it would seem a likley bet as to where it will try to put it.Please sign our petition to keep the post office in the town centre and help to save another town centre.
Thanks.
Councilors Mark Gadd Jacqui Gadd and Steven Sharp.
